data.title: Good salads with truly horrible, funny (not in a good way) service
data.text:
The salads are good and fresh.  

The service has to be seen to be believed.  A group of more useless, slow, and inept people has got to be hard to find.  Watch them walk around with no purpose trying to figure out what's supposed to be in your salad, consult each other cluelessly, and still manage, after 20 minutes, to inevitably give you the wrong dressing, the croutons you didn't ask for, the tofu instead of the chicken, or corn instead of black beans.  It's really quite a sight.  One person only at the register, who doesn't know how to use it.  Huge turnover, so every other week it's a new group of useless, hopeless people.  

It's really too bad because the food is pretty good and healthy.

data.title: Great salads.
data.text: Good salads, good for the money. I like the arugula customized one with anchovies, goat cheese , cranberries and tangerines. Yum!

data.title: Dont ask for delivery
data.text: I work in the Brickell area & try to call Giardino for delivery. Much of the time the phone rings & a recorder comes on saying that they're busy helping other customers. Other times someone picks up the phone & the minute you tell them you want delivery they ask if they can put you on hold for a second. I have waited up to 10 minutes & finally hung up....this happens very often. Their salads are good & their prices are fair. The quality of staff  at the Brickell location is poor.....I wonder how many orders they lose because of this.

data.title: Don't miss stopping by Giardino Salads, Brickell for a GREAT salad!
data.text: The MOST AMAZING salad and sandwich place. Were on our way to Jimmy Johns and saw the sign for Giardino next door. GREAT salad choices: quinoa, brown rice, salmon salad, fruited chicken salad, sun dried tomatoes, At least 25 different toppings and you can order right off the menu or create your own. I had arugula, quinoa, avocado, bacon, grilled chicken, dried cranberries, black olives and cucumbers with olive oil and lemon. Everything was so fresh. Will be back again....and they deliver.

data.title: Good Salad
data.text: Pretty cool spot in downtown if you want to maintain good healthy eating habits instead of your fast food fanfare in the vicinity

data.title: Fresh salad all day
data.text: I order from Giardino's almost every day for lunch. I work at brickell and it's hard for me to leave the office so I order by phone. I order mostly the Home Cooking or Indian with a side order of Curry Turkey. ABSOLUTELY love it, very fresh. Definitely recommend this place. When I order by phone the person who takes my order is very professional and VERY friendly AND to top it off, the guy who delivers (several of them) are also very friendly which makes it even better. In all I'm very happy with the fresh salads they offer, the staff members etc... TOP NOTCH place for salad.

data.title: Healthy option for lunch
data.text: Great option if you're looking for a quick byte over lunch. They offer several choices and you can mix and add ingredients. And it's super fast.

data.title: The wrap-salad is good
data.text: If you want a salad but not very into salads, try the salad inside a wrap with your choice of protein. Nice combination and very tasty. The food is fresh, the portions are good and the service is good too.

data.title: Excelente opción de comida sana
data.text: Muy cerca de donde nos quedamos en pleno Downtown encontramos este fantastico lugar donde pudimos escapar un poco de tanta comida grasosa y azucarada. La verdad que es un verdadero Oasis de salud en pleno Miami , personal muy atento!!!
